name: actions_get-actions-cache-usage-by-repo-for-org
description:
Lists repositories and their GitHub Actions cache usage for an organization.
The data fetched using this API is refreshed approximately every 5 minutes, so values returned from this endpoint may take at least 5 minutes to get updated.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `read:org` scope to use this endpoint. GitHub Apps must have the `organization_admistration:read` permission to use this endpoint.

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

page.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
